directions: Whisk ketchup, water, cider vinegar, honey, molasses, tomato paste, brown sugar, onion powder, chili powder, garlic powder, black pepper, hot pepper sauce, Worcestershire sauce, and dry mustard together in a saucepan over low heat; bring to a simmer and cook until thickened, 30 to 45 minutes.
title: DW's Tangy 'Que Sauce
